name: S3Tool
modelDescription: Execute S3 commands including bucket configuration. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListObjectsV2 {command:'ListObjectsV2', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name'}}. GetBucketLocation {command:'GetBucketLocation', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name'}}. GetBucketEncryption {command:'GetBucketEncryption', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name'}}. GetBucketVersioning {command:'GetBucketVersioning', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name'}}. GetBucketLifecycleConfiguration {command:'GetBucketLifecycleConfiguration', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name'}}. PutObject {command:'PutObject', params:{Bucket:'name', Key:'path', Body:'content'}}. DeleteObject {command:'DeleteObject', params:{Bucket:'name', Key:'path'}}.
userDescription: Execute S3 commands including bucket configuration (location, encryption, versioning, lifecycle, replication, logging, tags, CORS, website), object operations, and open S3 Explorer view

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. For write operations ensure Bucket and Key are provided.

Bucket.description: Bucket name (Used by: HeadBucket (Required), HeadObject (Required), ListObjectsV2 (Required), ListObjectVersions (Required), GetBucketPolicy (Required), GetBucketNotificationConfiguration (Required), GetBucketLocation (Required), GetBucketVersioning (Required), GetBucketEncryption (Required), GetBucketLifecycleConfiguration (Required), GetBucketReplication (Required), GetBucketLogging (Required), GetBucketTagging (Required), GetBucketCors (Required), GetBucketWebsite (Required), GetBucketAccelerateConfiguration (Required), GetBucketRequestPayment (Required), GetObject (Required), GetObjectAttributes (Required), GetObjectLegalHold (Required), GetObjectRetention (Required), PutObject (Required), DeleteObject (Required), CopyObject (Required), SelectObjectContent (Required), OpenS3Explorer (Required))

Key.description: Object key path (Used by: HeadObject (Required), GetObject (Required), GetObjectAttributes (Required), GetObjectLegalHold (Required), GetObjectRetention (Required), PutObject (Required), DeleteObject (Required), CopyObject (Required), SelectObjectContent (Required), OpenS3Explorer)

CopySource.description: Source object path for copy command (Used by: CopyObject (Required))

Body.description: Object content as string or base64 (Used by: PutObject)

ContentType.description: MIME type for the object (Used by: PutObject)

Prefix.description: Filter objects by prefix path (Used by: ListObjectsV2, ListObjectVersions, OpenS3Explorer)

Delimiter.description: Delimiter character for grouping keys, typically / (Used by: ListObjectsV2, ListObjectVersions)

MaxKeys.description: Maximum number of keys to return (Used by: ListObjectsV2, ListObjectVersions)

ContinuationToken.description: Token for pagination from previous response (Used by: ListObjectsV2)

StartAfter.description: Start listing after this key name (Used by: ListObjectsV2)

VersionId.description: Specific version ID of object (Used by: HeadObject, GetObject, DeleteObject)

KeyMarker.description: Key marker for version pagination (Used by: ListObjectVersions)

VersionIdMarker.description: Version ID marker for pagination (Used by: ListObjectVersions)

Metadata.description: Custom metadata key-value pairs (Used by: PutObject, CopyObject)

MetadataDirective.description: How to handle metadata in CopyObject: COPY or REPLACE (Used by: CopyObject)

DownloadToTemp.description: Download file to temp folder and return local path (Used by: GetObject)

AsText.description: Return file content as text for analysis (Used by: GetObject)

Expression.description: SQL expression for querying object content (Used by: SelectObjectContent (Required))

InputSerialization.description: Format of the input data (Used by: SelectObjectContent (Required))

OutputSerialization.description: Format for output data (Used by: SelectObjectContent (Required))

ObjectAttributes.description: Object attributes to retrieve (Used by: GetObjectAttributes (Required))

ExpectedBucketOwner.description: Expected bucket owner account ID (Used by: GetBucketLocation, GetBucketVersioning, GetBucketEncryption, GetBucketLifecycleConfiguration, GetBucketReplication, GetBucketLogging, GetBucketTagging, GetBucketCors, GetBucketWebsite, GetBucketAccelerateConfiguration, GetBucketRequestPayment, GetObjectAttributes, GetObjectLegalHold, GetObjectRetention)
